name: Elvish Spirit Guide
text: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor:
"We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

"We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Elvish Vanguard
text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.

editions.flavor: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."
"Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."

name: Elvish Visionary
text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

editions.flavor: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.
Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.
"From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

editions.flavor: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."
"From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."
"From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."
"My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."
As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.

name: Emancipation Angel
text:
Flying
When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: "You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."
"You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."

name: Embalmed Brawler
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Whenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Embalmer's Tools
text:
Activated abilities of creature cards in your graveyard cost {1} less to activate.
Tap an untapped Zombie you control: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"They might be dead, but these mummies are masters of their trade."
—Jace Beleren

name: Embargo
text:
Nonland permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

name: Ember Beast
text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

editions.flavor: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

Spot one ember beast, attack.
Spot a second, best fall back.
—Dwarven saying
The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

name: Ember-Eye Wolf
text:
Haste
{1}{R}: Ember-Eye Wolf gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: No howl. No snarl. Just the roar of flames.

name: Ember-Fist Zubera
text: When Ember-Fist Zubera dies, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Zubera that died this turn.

editions.flavor: When the Honden of Infinite Rage shattered, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to sow mortal destruction.

name: Ember Gale
text: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. Ember Gale deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.

editions.flavor:
"Terrible wind. It whipped sparks into our skin, then stoked them even hotter!"
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Ember Hauler
text: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: Ember Hauler deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: Flurk's crude goblin language didn't differentiate between "I bring the flame" and "I am the flame."

name: Emberhorn Minotaur
text: You may exert Emberhorn Minotaur as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

editions.flavor: "My stride will break only against the twin points of Hazoret's spear."

name: Embermage Goblin
text:
When Embermage Goblin enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Embermage Goblin, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{T}: Embermage Goblin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Embermaw Hellion
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

name: Ember Shot
text:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.

name: Embersmith
text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Embersmith deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: The Vulshok see the artificer as a catalyst, bringing the spark of creation that ignites change.

name: Emberstrike Duo
text:
Whenever you cast a black spell, Emberstrike Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a red spell, Emberstrike Duo gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Ember Swallower
text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Ember Swallower becomes monstrous, each player sacrifices three lands.

name: Ember Weaver
text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

editions.flavor:
"Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky."
—Sunseeder myth

name: Emberwilde Augur
text: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

editions.flavor: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins
editions.flavor: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

name: Emberwilde Caliph
text:
Flying, trample
Emberwilde Caliph attacks each turn if able.
Whenever Emberwilde Caliph deals damage, you lose that much life.

editions.flavor: The fire breathes while the air burns.

name: Emberwilde Djinn
text:
Flying
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {R}{R} or 2 life. If he or she does, the player gains control of Emberwilde Djinn.

editions.flavor: A hefty price is no guarantee of quality merchandise.

name: Emblazoned Golem
text:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Emblem of the Warmind
text:
Enchant creature you control
Creatures you control have haste.

editions.flavor:
"It takes but one spark to ignite a parched forest. Our hearts, I fear, are too dry for this new visitor."
—Elek Longbeard

name: Embodiment of Fury
text:
Trample
Land creatures you control have trample.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target land you control become a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

name: Embodiment of Insight
text:
Vigilance
Land creatures you control have vigilance.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target land you control become a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

name: Embodiment of Spring
text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Embodiment of Spring: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: Arel dreamed of winter's end. The next morning she followed a strange trail and found a seedling in the snow.

name: Embolden
text:
Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.
Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Embraal Bruiser
text:
Embraal Bruiser enters the battlefield tapped.
Embraal Bruiser has menace as long as you control an artifact.

editions.flavor: In Embraal, inventor gangs defend their turf with ingenious devices and blunt objects.

name: Embraal Gear-Smasher
text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Embraal Gear-Smasher deals 2 damage to each opponent.

editions.flavor: "A well-made wrench is a versatile, indispensable tool."

name: Embrace My Diabolical Vision
text: When you set this scheme in motion, each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws four cards.

editions.flavor: "My vision is for the good of everyone. Mostly me."

name: Emcee
text: Whenever another creature comes into play, you may stand up and say in a deep, booming voice "Presenting . . . " and that creature's name. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

editions.flavor: The ogre appealed the match loss and got it downgraded to a warning.

name: Emerald Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Untap target permanent.
• Destroy target non-Aura enchantment.
• Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Emerald Dragonfly
text:
Flying
{G}{G}: Emerald Dragonfly gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Flittering, wheeling,/ darting in to strike, and then/ gone just as you blink."
—"Dragonfly Haiku," poet unkown

—"Dragonfly Haiku," poet unkown

name: Emerald Medallion
text: Green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

name: Emerald Oryx
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

editions.flavor: After the oryx dies, its flesh returns to the earth, but its emerald bones remain as a tribute to the forest.

name: Emerge Unscathed
text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Emeria Angel
text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

editions.flavor: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

name: Emeria Shepherd
text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that land is a Plains, you may return that nonland permanent card to the battlefield instead.

name: Emeria, the Sky Ruin
text:
Emeria, the Sky Ruin enters the battlefield tapped.

text:
Flying
Whenever Emissary of Despair deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 1 life for each artifact he or she controls.

Flying
Whenever Emissary of Hope deals combat damage to a player, you gain 1 life for each artifact that player controls.

name: Emissary of the Sleepless
text:
Flying
When Emissary of the Sleepless enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Emissary's Ploy
text:
(Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Before drawing your opening hand, choose 1, 2, or 3.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast creature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number.

name: Emmara Tandris
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creature tokens you control.

editions.flavor: When Selesnya needed a champion, Emmara put the ranks of her guild before herself—making her the perfect choice.

name: Emmessi Tome
text: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

editions.flavor: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.
It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

name: Emperor Crocodile
text: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

editions.flavor: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.
The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.
The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.
The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

name: Empress Galina
text: {U}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target legendary permanent. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

editions.flavor: "Above the waves you may be mighty indeed, but down here you belong to me."

name: Empty City Ruse
text: Target opponent skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.

editions.flavor: Out of time and options, Kongming was forced to bluff at Xicheng. He tricked an army of 150,000 Wei by leaving the city gates open and calmly playing the zither.

name: Empty-Shrine Kannushi
text: Empty-Shrine Kannushi has protection from the colors of permanents you control.

editions.flavor: "Crease the folds, bend the paper, turn the spirits, shield the soul."

name: Empty the Catacombs
text: Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

editions.flavor: When the dead are laid to rest in Ravnica, it's usually just a nap.

name: Empty the Pits
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Create X tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

editions.flavor: The Sultai would rebuild the empire on the backs of the dead.

name: Empty the Warrens
text:
Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

editions.flavor: It's never just one goblin.

"They'd pour out of the warrens to make war (and to make room for the littering matrons)."
—Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

"They'd pour out of the warrens to make war (and to make room for the littering matrons)."
—Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

name: Empyreal Voyager
text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Empyreal Voyager deals combat damage to a player, you get that many {E} (energy counters).

editions.flavor: "For years, I studied the aethersphere from afar, but it was not until I touched the aether for myself that I came to know the power contained in the swirling sky."

name: Empyrial Archangel
text:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Empyrial Archangel instead.

editions.flavor: Her wings are the prayers of the devoted; her sword, the despair of the vile.

name: Empyrial Armor
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

editions.flavor: "An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire." -"Hymn of Angelfire"

name: Empyrial Plate
text:

Equip {2}

editions.flavor: A body clad in steel reflects a warrior's resolve.

name: Emrakul's Evangel
text: {T}, Sacrifice Emrakul's Evangel and any number of other non-Eldrazi creatures: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

editions.flavor:
"In times like these, be particularly wary of those who claim they can save your soul."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Emrakul's Hatcher
text: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

editions.flavor: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.
Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

name: Emrakul's Influence
text: Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, draw two cards.

editions.flavor: Hordes of Eldrazi and cultists swarmed over Thraben's defenses, and the members of the Gatewatch found themselves overrun.

name: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
text:
Emrakul, the Aeons Torn can't be countered.
When you cast Emrakul, take an extra turn after this one.
Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6
When Emrakul is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

name: Emrakul, the Promised End
text:
Emrakul, the Promised End costs {1} less to cast for each card type among cards in your graveyard.  
When you cast Emrakul, you gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn. After that turn, that player takes an extra turn.
Flying, trample, protection from instants

editions.flavor: An enigma as vexing as life itself.

name: Enatu Golem
text: When Enatu Golem dies, you gain 4 life.

editions.flavor: Golems conjured from the debris of Enatu Temple provided a sturdy but expendable first line of defense against the Eldrazi.

name: Encase in Ice
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant red or green creature
When Encase in Ice enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Enchanted Being
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Enchanted Being by enchanted creatures.

name: Enchanted Evening
text: All permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types.

editions.flavor: In the reflection, she saw the rough shell of the world sloughing away, revealing the truth shining underneath.

name: Enchantment Alteration
text: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

name: Enchantress's Presence
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

editions.flavor: "The wise learn from successes as well as mistakes."

name: Encircling Fissure
text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures target opponent controls.
Awaken 2—{4}{W} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}, also put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

name: Enclave Elite
text:
Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Enclave Elite enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Encroach
text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.

editions.flavor:
"The rate of spread in this region is unacceptable. Start again."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Encroaching Wastes
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.

editions.flavor: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.
Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.

name: Encrust
text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.

editions.flavor:
"The sea blesses the tiny with the power to fell the mighty."
—Talrand, sky summoner

"Barnacles are the sea's final defense."
—Garild, merfolk mage

name: Endangered Armodon
text: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.

editions.flavor: These are its last days. Its doom to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.
These are its last days. It is doomed to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

name: Endbringer
text:
Untap Endbringer during each other player's untap step.
{T}: Endbringer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{C}, {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
{C}{C}, {T}: Draw a card.

name: Endbringer's Revel
text: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor: First death. Then Shauku.

name: Endemic Plague
text:
As an additional cost to cast Endemic Plague, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy all creatures that share a creature type with the sacrificed creature. They can't be regenerated.

name: End Hostilities
text: Destroy all creatures and all permanents attached to creatures.

editions.flavor: Her palm flared like the eye of a waking dragon. Then all was calm.

name: Endless Cockroaches
text: When Endless Cockroaches dies, return it to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: There is nothing more repulsive than a cockroach—except a cockroach and all its friends.

name: Endless Horizons
text:
When Endless Horizons enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Plains cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card you own exiled with Endless Horizons into your hand.

name: Endless Obedience
text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Endless One
text: Endless One enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

editions.flavor: It embodies all possible meanings of the word "infinite."
It embodies all possible meanings of the word "infinite."

name: Endless Ranks of the Dead
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

editions.flavor: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

name: Endless Scream
text:
Enchant creature
Endless Scream enters the battlefield with X scream counters on it.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each scream counter on Endless Scream.

editions.flavor:
"I have made Crovax weep; now I will make him scream. The pain will not end, but will bind him to me."
—Volrath

name: Endless Swarm
text:
Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token for each card in your hand.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

name: Endless Whispers
text: Each creature has "When this creature dies, choose target opponent. That player puts this card from its owner's graveyard onto the battlefield under his or her control at the beginning of the next end step."

editions.flavor: Those who find death under the black sun's shadow cannot escape its pull.

name: Endless Wurm
text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Endless Wurm unless you sacrifice an enchantment.

editions.flavor: Ages ago, a party of elves took cover to let one pass. They're still waiting.

name: Endoskeleton
text:
You may choose not to untap Endoskeleton during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+3 for as long as Endoskeleton remains tapped.

name: Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create X 1/1 black Thrull creature tokens, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
When you control seven or more Thrulls, sacrifice Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder.

name: Ends
text: Target player sacrifices two attacking creatures.

name: Endure
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn.

editions.flavor: The Aurora had lessened the kithkins' kindness, deepened their paranoia, and dulled their sense of pain.

name: Enduring Ideal
text:
Search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

name: Enduring Renewal
text:
Play with your hand revealed.
If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.
Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

editions.flavor: That which lasts longest serves best.

name: Enduring Scalelord
text:
Flying
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.

editions.flavor: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.
Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

name: Enduring Victory
text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

editions.flavor:
"My dragonlord is immortal. Most dragons are not."
—Kadri, Dromoka warrior

name: Enemy of the Guildpact
text: Protection from multicolored

editions.flavor: Guilds often exterminate those who saw or knew too much. Some vindictive souls retain their knowledge, using it in the afterlife to crush the guilded and the vile bargain that gives them power.

name: Energizer
text: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Energizer.

editions.flavor: Like a kettle set to boil, it must eventually go off—on someone.
